name: Weapon 1
comment: Subtract 1 from weapon/armor references to get the corresponding array index.

name: Weapon 2
comment: High(?) bit indicates whether something is currently equipped. Should be split out.

name: Damage
comment: Note: If you equip/de-equip things, you'll have to update this too. The game is too dumb to recalculate it. Formula is weapon attack + str / 2, or lvl*2 for unarmed BB

name: Unknown 3
comment: Probably not part of evade, unless it's big endian, which nothing else is.

name: Unknown 4
comment: Probably not part of mdef, unless it's big endian, which nothing else is.
